abstract: Makarim Wibisono submits resignation from post as United Nations rapporteur for human rights in Palestinian territories after Israel refuses his multiple requests for access to the West Bank and Gaza; resignation is set to take effect March 31.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | United Nations; Envoy for West Bank and Gaza Quits, Citing Lack of Cooperation by Israelis
headline.main: U.N. Rights Monitor for Palestinian Territories Resigns

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Makarim Wibisono cited Israel’s refusal to grant him access to the West Bank and Gaza as he stepped down from the United Nations Human Rights Council.
lead_paragraph: Makarim Wibisono cited Israel’s refusal to grant him access to the West Bank and Gaza as he stepped down from the United Nations Human Rights Council.
